sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import {Container, Row, Col,Form,ListGroup} from "react-bootstrap"; import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom'; import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' const TourDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour => tour.id === id) const {photo, title, address, price, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour return <>

{title}

{address}
{city} â‚¹{price}/per perso {maxGroupSize}
} export default TourDetails
